Parameter.Label: Button mode

Item.Label: Two paddles with Power and Direction

Parameter.Help: Controls number and function of buttons
Time period for the motor to continue operation

Parameter.Label: What to do on RF close command
Parameter.Help: Defines how to interpret RF Off command. Can be used in conjunction with Auto Close function: Ignore - to open the door by motion detectors and close it back after some amount of time

Parameter.Label: Typical click timeout
Parameter.Help: Typical time used to differentiate click, hold, double and triple clicks (1-100ms in 10ms steps)

Parameter.Label: Action on button press or hold

Item.Label: Switch On, Off and dim using Basic Set and MultiLevel Start/Stop Changing

Parameter.Help: Defines which command should be sent to Association group on button press or hold. Scene mode will send 1 for Up event, 2 for Stop, 3 for Down

Parameter.Label: Full close time
Parameter.Help: Time to go from opened to closed state. Used to estimate the current level. Note that in Permanent motion mode the reported value would be Closed or Opened, while all Basic and Multilevel Set values (1-99, 255) would Open except 0 value that would Close

Parameter.Label: Full open time
Parameter.Help: Time to go from closed to open state. This value may differ from full close time for some blinds due to gravity. Used to estimate the current level. Note that in Permanent motion mode the reported value would be Closed or Opened, while all Basic and Multilevel Set values (1-99, 255) would Open except 0 value that would Close

Parameter.Label: Node Id of the blocking device
Parameter.Help: Id of the device which commands would be interpreted not as Open/Close, but as block/unblock. Useful with door opening detector: if the door is open, block the blind not to break shades while they move

Parameter.Label: On which command from blocking node to enable the protection
Parameter.Help: Defines which command from blocking device to interpret as closed door and hence, unprotected

Parameter.Label: Invert open and close relays
Parameter.Help: Allow exchanging open and close relays if blind control is wired to the motor incorrectly

Group.Label: Click
Group.Help: Click, press and hold of up/down buttons

Group.Label: Change
Group.Help: Send Reports on blind state change
